Joint patrols in West Philippine Sea shouldn t be done to wage war vs. China -- Esperon tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735907 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/735907/joint-patrols-in-west-philippine-sea-shouldn-t-be-done-to-wage-war-vs-china-esperon/story/ "Kung ang pagsasamahan natin ng Vietnam, Malaysia at ASEAN ay ang common enforcement ng fishery at safety of life at sea, maganda 'yan. Talagang ginagawa 'yan," National Security Adviser Hermogenes Esperon said at a Laging Handa press briefing. "Pero, kung ang iniisip ni Justice [Antonio] Carpio ay pakikipag-giyera, iwanan na lang niya 'yan sa Defense, kinikilala natin siya sa kaalaman sa hustisya, huwag na siyang masyadong pumapel sa pakikipag-giyera," he added.
